version_description: We made Progression free so that everyone can use the app. For the full functionality you can unlock the app. All users who bought Progression before, already have the full functionality unlocked.

Notes functionality:
- Add notes during your workout
- Add notes in your workout planning to show them in every workout session
- Review your notes in the log
UI improvements:
- Open the help screen when you have a question during your workout planning
- View the min and max repetitions during your workout session

This update increases the stability and optimises the way to ask for a rating.

- Introducing Apple Health. Now your time and type of workout are logged in Health.
- Introducing Shortcuts. Start your next workout with 3D Touch from your homescreen. Progression looks at your workout routine and puts your next workout in the first row.
- The touch area of the timer button has been increased and now also supports 3D Touch.

- Introducing Apple Health. Now your time and type of workout are logged in Health.
- Introducing Shortcuts. Start your next workout with 3D Touch from your homescreen. Progression looks at your workout routine and puts your next workout in the first row.
- The touch area of the timer button has been increased and now also supports 3D Touch.
- Fixes issue which occured when removing workouts which were not stored in Health.
- Fixes issue which occured when removing workouts which were not stored in Health.

- Dark Mode
- New iOS 13 Design
- Rating the app got easier
- Optimized log export file
